body: the fuck is this wacky ass writing
olwen is the best. her story is the best. others are just rape and ntr or gay shit.

If Betram really had syphilis, Evelyn would have got infected very early since the pair had sex for quite a lot of times. Besides, at first I felt sad for Evelyn...when she made love with Betram, it seems that she had given up and thought Betram treated her like a toy or a tool that he let another guy fuck her right under his eyes. But after reading this series repeatedly, I have another idea. Since Betram knew about the dirty play between Evelyn and Lucien in chapter 3, maybe he was also insecure about his relationship with Evelyn. As she's his first girl, perhaps he thought women might love having sexual relationships with more than one men and he's not sure if Evelyn loved him, adding that he's not sure if he could truly fall in love with a girl because he considered himself as homosexual throughout his life. Sorry for being way too serious in an H-manga website...I just love this series sooooo much
Came for the porn, stayed for the plot
It is not syphilis, they are marks of a whip, syphilis is with hives.
Not sure if everyone is joking about the syphilis thing. Looks more like scars from lashings. Since his habit isn't that much of a secret I'd guess his father has had him whipped several times.

This artist is so talented!! I really admire how the sex scenes are drawn. They're very sensual and many of the panels have gorgeous originality to how they're depicted. I could feel the characters' chemistry vicariously and my cold, porn-deadened heart was racing... I admire this storyteller so much. <3 Also this sent me down a rabbit hole reading about medieval syphilis.
I cried when they confessed, my otp... Holy hell i’m here to fap, finding feels instead

Is...this after Richildis??? Or before Olwen?????

Still seeing Olwen is such a blast...
Gosh i love this series sm
Fuck man I forgot all about these Saint Foire Festival series. Kinda wish I hadn't remembered, haha
Aww Olwen I fucking love her!!! She’s my favorite character for Saint Forest Saga!! I can’t wait for the next book!!
I was not expecting to like this

> girl got raped by a trap in front of gay she like. > she liked it. > she complained to the gay whyd he let her get raped. > gay was awake the whole time touching traps dick. > girl complained again. > gay only uses her as a tool. > gay doesn't know basic reproduction. > gay is now angry  that trap might became the dad. > she loves gay and gay loves(maybe not idk) her. > they fucked. > trap comes back and the 2 humans with xy sex chromosome got into quarrel in politics. > girl accidentally pulls gays shirt. > gay has syphilis.

Ok,i'm not into rape,not into netorare,not into yaoi,not into cheating and else,but let me say this,this thing here is somewhat....truly good to read.
I bow down to the author,really,art is amazing,the story is not some cliche we always read,and i truly can't wait for the next chapter.
